Uses of Class
planets.physics.physicsObjects.Planet

  • Packages that use Planet 
    Package Description
    mouseTools
    Contains each of the different tools that are used to interact with the simulation.
    planets
    Everything relating to planets.
    planets.physics
    Everything related to the newtonian behavior of planets.
    planets.physics.physicsObjects
    Objects to be interacted with by the Physics Engine.
    projectData
    All data that needs to be saved and loaded.
    ui.drawer
    Classes in charge of the drawers within the PropertiesPane.

    • Uses of Planet in planets

      Methods in planets with parameters of type Planet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PlanetManager.registerPlanet(Planet p)
      Takes a Planet object and registers it to the simulation by creating a PlanetDisplay and adding the planet to lists that will be used for physics calculations and rendering.

    • Uses of Planet in planets.physics

      Methods in planets.physics with parameters of type Planet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void PhysicsEngine.updatePosition(Planet p, double deltaSeconds)
      Uses the planet's velocity to reposition the planet.
